title: From Roglič and Remco through Kuss and Ciccone: Ranking the Vuelta a España GC contenders
content:
The Vuelta boasts the strongest GC field of the season's grand tours – we pick the favorites, dark horses, and outsiders.

Read the full article at From Roglič and Remco through Kuss and Ciccone: Ranking the Vuelta a España GC contenders on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
